name: com.google.firebase.firestore
description:
Store and sync game data at global scale.

Cloud Firestore is a flexible NoSQL document database that lets you easily store, sync, and query data for your games - at global scale.

Firestore supports a million players connected simultaneously with a guaranteed uptime of 5 nines for multi-region instances. That’s less than 5 minutes of downtime a year!

With Cloud Firestore, your players can access and make changes to their data at any time, even when they're offline.
